doc.title: IPv6

value.content: IPv6 is the current version of the communication protocol underlying the Internet. Slowly IPv6 is replacing IPv4, among other reasons because IPv6 allows for many different IP addresses.

value.title: See also
value.content: • IPv6 on Wikipedia
